text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: dhundhur nAma mahAtejAs tayoH putro mahAdyutiH
text.ur: dhundhur nāma mahātejās tayoḥ putro mahādyutiḥ

text.ascii: sa tapo 'tapyata mahan mahAvIryaparAkramaH
text.ur: sa tapo ’tapyata mahan mahāvīryaparākramaḥ

text.ascii: atiSThad ekapAdena kRzo dhamanisaMtataH
text.ur: atiṣṭhad ekapādena kr̥śo dhamanisaṁtataḥ

text.ascii: tasmai brahmA dadau prIto varaM vavre sa ca prabho
text.ud: तस्मै ब्रह्मा ददौ प्रीतो वरं वव्रे स च प्रभो
text.ur: tasmai brahmā dadau prīto varaṁ vavre sa ca prabho

text.ascii: devadAnavayakSANAM sarpagandharvarakSasAm
text.ur: devadānavayakṣāṇāṁ sarpagandharvarakṣasām

text.ascii: avadhyo 'haM bhaveyaM vai vara eSa vRto mayA
text.ud: अवध्योऽहं भवेयं वै वर एष वृतो मया
text.ur: avadhyo ’haṁ bhaveyaṁ vai vara eṣa vr̥to mayā

text.ascii: evaM bhavatu gaccheti tam uvAca pitAmahaH
text.ur: evaṁ bhavatu gaccheti tam uvāca pitāmahaḥ

text.ascii: sa evam uktas tatpAdau mUrdhnA spRzya jagAma ha
text.ud: स एवमुक्तस्तत्पादौ मूर्ध्ना स्पृश्य जगाम ह
text.ur: sa evam uktas tatpādau mūrdhnā spr̥śya jagāma ha

text.ascii: sa tu dhundhur varaM labdhvA mahAvIryaparAkramaH
text.ur: sa tu dhundhur varaṁ labdhvā mahāvīryaparākramaḥ

text.ascii: anusmaran pitRvadhaM tato viSNum upAdravat
text.ur: anusmaran pitr̥vadhaṁ tato viṣṇum upādravat

text.ascii: sa tu devAn sagandharvAJ jitvA dhundhur amarSaNaH
text.ur: sa tu devān sagandharvāñ jitvā dhundhur amarṣaṇaḥ

text.ascii: babAdha sarvAn asakRd devAn viSNuM ca vai bhRzam
text.ur: babādha sarvān asakr̥d devān viṣṇuṁ ca vai bhr̥śam

text.ascii: samudro vAlukApUrNa ujjAnaka iti smRtaH
text.ur: samudro vālukāpūrṇa ujjānaka iti smr̥taḥ

text.ascii: Agamya ca sa duSTAtmA taM dezaM bharatarSabha
text.ud: आगम्य च स दुष्टात्मा तं देशं भरतर्षभ
text.ur: āgamya ca sa duṣṭātmā taṁ deśaṁ bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: bAdhate sma paraM zaktyA tam uttaGkAzramaM prabho
text.ud: बाधते स्म परं शक्त्या तमुत्तङ्काश्रमं प्रभो
text.ur: bādhate sma paraṁ śaktyā tam uttaṅkāśramaṁ prabho

text.ascii: antarbhUmigatas tatra vAlukAntarhitas tadA
text.ur: antarbhūmigatas tatra vālukāntarhitas tadā

text.ascii: madhukaiTabhayoH putro dhundhur bhImaparAkramaH
text.ur: madhukaiṭabhayoḥ putro dhundhur bhīmaparākramaḥ

text.ascii: zete lokavinAzAya tapobalasamAzritaH
text.ur: śete lokavināśāya tapobalasamāśritaḥ

text.ascii: uttaGkasyAzramAbhyAze niHzvasan pAvakArciSaH
text.ur: uttaṅkasyāśramābhyāśe niḥśvasan pāvakārciṣaḥ

text.ascii: etasminn eva kAle tu sabhRtyabalavAhanaH
text.ur: etasminn eva kāle tu sabhr̥tyabalavāhanaḥ

text.ascii: kuvalAzvo narapatir anvito balazAlinAm
text.ur: kuvalāśvo narapatir anvito balaśālinām

text.ascii: sahasrair ekaviMzatyA putrANAm arimardanaH
text.ur: sahasrair ekaviṁśatyā putrāṇām arimardanaḥ

text.ascii: prAyAd uttaGkasahito dhundhos tasya nivezanam
text.ur: prāyād uttaṅkasahito dhundhos tasya niveśanam

text.ascii: tam Avizat tato viSNur bhagavAMs tejasA prabhuH
text.ur: tam āviśat tato viṣṇur bhagavāṁs tejasā prabhuḥ

text.ascii: uttaGkasya niyogena lokAnAM hitakAmyayA
text.ur: uttaṅkasya niyogena lokānāṁ hitakāmyayā

text.ascii: tasmin prayAte durdharSe divi zabdo mahAn abhUt
text.ur: tasmin prayāte durdharṣe divi śabdo mahān abhūt

text.ascii: eSa zrImAn nRpasuto dhundhumAro bhaviSyati
text.ur: eṣa śrīmān nr̥pasuto dhundhumāro bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: divyaiz ca puSpais taM devAH samantAt paryavAkiran
text.ur: divyaiś ca puṣpais taṁ devāḥ samantāt paryavākiran

text.ascii: devadundubhayaz caiva neduH svayam udIritAH
text.ur: devadundubhayaś caiva neduḥ svayam udīritāḥ

text.ascii: zItaz ca vAyuH pravavau prayANe tasya dhImataH
text.ud: शीतश्च वायुः प्रववौ प्रयाणे तस्य धीमतः
text.ur: śītaś ca vāyuḥ pravavau prayāṇe tasya dhīmataḥ

text.ascii: vipAMsulAM mahIM kurvan vavarSa ca surezvaraH
text.ur: vipāṁsulāṁ mahīṁ kurvan vavarṣa ca sureśvaraḥ

text.ascii: antarikSe vimAnAni devatAnAM yudhiSThira
text.ur: antarikṣe vimānāni devatānāṁ yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: tatraiva samadRzyanta dhundhur yatra mahAsuraH
text.ur: tatraiva samadr̥śyanta dhundhur yatra mahāsuraḥ

text.ascii: kuvalAzvasya dhundhoz ca yuddhakautUhalAnvitAH
text.ur: kuvalāśvasya dhundhoś ca yuddhakautūhalānvitāḥ

text.ascii: devagandharvasahitAH samavaikSan maharSayaH
text.ur: devagandharvasahitāḥ samavaikṣan maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: nArAyaNena kauravya tejasApyAyitas tadA
text.ur: nārāyaṇena kauravya tejasāpyāyitas tadā

text.ascii: sa gato nRpatiH kSipraM putrais taiH sarvatodizam
text.ud: स गतो नृपतिः क्षिप्रं पुत्रैस्तैः सर्वतोदिशम्
text.ur: sa gato nr̥patiḥ kṣipraṁ putrais taiḥ sarvatodiśam

text.ascii: arNavaM khAnayAm Asa kuvalAzvo mahIpatiH
text.ur: arṇavaṁ khānayām āsa kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: kuvalAzvasya putrais tu tasmin vai vAlukArNave
text.ur: kuvalāśvasya putrais tu tasmin vai vālukārṇave

text.ascii: saptabhir divasaiH khAtvA dRSTo dhundhur mahAbalaH
text.ur: saptabhir divasaiḥ khātvā dr̥ṣṭo dhundhur mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: AsId ghoraM vapus tasya vAlukAntarhitaM mahat
text.ur: āsīd ghoraṁ vapus tasya vālukāntarhitaṁ mahat

text.ascii: dIpyamAnaM yathA sUryas tejasA bharatarSabha
text.ur: dīpyamānaṁ yathā sūryas tejasā bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: tato dhundhur mahArAja dizam Azritya pazcimAm
text.ur: tato dhundhur mahārāja diśam āśritya paścimām

text.ascii: supto 'bhUd rAjazArdUla kAlAnalasamadyutiH
text.ur: supto ’bhūd rājaśārdūla kālānalasamadyutiḥ

text.ascii: kuvalAzvasya putrais tu sarvataH parivAritaH
text.ur: kuvalāśvasya putrais tu sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ

text.ascii: abhidrutaH zarais tIkSNair gadAbhir musalair api
text.ur: abhidrutaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair gadābhir musalair api

text.ascii: paTTizaiH parighaiH prAsaiH khaDgaiz ca vimalaiH zitaiH
text.ud: पट्टिशैः परिघैः प्रासैः खड्गैश्च विमलैः शितैः
text.ur: paṭṭiśaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiś ca vimalaiḥ śitaiḥ

text.ascii: sa vadhyamAnaH saMkruddhaH samuttasthau mahAbalaH
text.ur: sa vadhyamānaḥ saṁkruddhaḥ samuttasthau mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: kruddhaz cAbhakSayat teSAM zastrANi vividhAni ca
text.ur: kruddhaś cābhakṣayat teṣāṁ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca

text.ascii: AsyAd vaman pAvakaM sa saMvartakasamaM tadA
text.ur: āsyād vaman pāvakaṁ sa saṁvartakasamaṁ tadā

text.ascii: tAn sarvAn nRpateH putrAn adahat svena tejasA
text.ur: tān sarvān nr̥pateḥ putrān adahat svena tejasā

text.ascii: mukhajenAgninA kruddho lokAn udvartayann iva
text.ur: mukhajenāgninā kruddho lokān udvartayann iva

text.ascii: kSaNena rAjazArdUla pureva kapilaH prabhuH
text.ur: kṣaṇena rājaśārdūla pureva kapilaḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: sagarasyAtmajAn kruddhas tad adbhutam ivAbhavat
text.ur: sagarasyātmajān kruddhas tad adbhutam ivābhavat

text.ascii: teSu krodhAgnidagdheSu tadA bharatasattama
text.ur: teṣu krodhāgnidagdheṣu tadā bharatasattama

text.ascii: taM prabuddhaM mahAtmAnaM kumbhakarNam ivAparam
text.ur: taṁ prabuddhaṁ mahātmānaṁ kumbhakarṇam ivāparam

text.ascii: AsasAda mahAtejAH kuvalAzvo mahIpatiH
text.ur: āsasāda mahātejāḥ kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥ

text.ascii: tasya vAri mahArAja susrAva bahu dehataH
text.ud: तस्य वारि महाराज सुस्राव बहु देहतः
text.ur: tasya vāri mahārāja susrāva bahu dehataḥ

text.ascii: tadApIyata tat tejo rAjA vArimayaM nRpa
text.ur: tadāpīyata tat tejo rājā vārimayaṁ nr̥pa

text.ascii: yogI yogena vahniM ca zamayAm Asa vAriNA
text.ud: योगी योगेन वह्निं च शमयामास वारिणा
text.ur: yogī yogena vahniṁ ca śamayām āsa vāriṇā

text.ascii: brahmAstreNa tadA rAjA daityaM krUraparAkramam
text.ur: brahmāstreṇa tadā rājā daityaṁ krūraparākramam

text.ascii: dadAha bharatazreSTha sarvalokAbhayAya vai
text.ur: dadāha bharataśreṣṭha sarvalokābhayāya vai

text.ascii: so 'streNa dagdhvA rAjarSiH kuvalAzvo mahAsuram
text.ur: so ’streṇa dagdhvā rājarṣiḥ kuvalāśvo mahāsuram

text.ascii: surazatrum amitraghnas trilokeza ivAparaH
text.ur: suraśatrum amitraghnas trilokeśa ivāparaḥ

text.ascii: dhundhumAra iti khyAto nAmnA samabhavat tataH
text.ur: dhundhumāra iti khyāto nāmnā samabhavat tataḥ

text.ascii: prItaiz ca tridazaiH sarvair maharSisahitais tadA
text.ur: prītaiś ca tridaśaiḥ sarvair maharṣisahitais tadā

text.ascii: varaM vRNISvety uktaH sa prAJjaliH praNatas tadA
text.ur: varaṁ vr̥ṇīṣvety uktaḥ sa prāñjaliḥ praṇatas tadā

text.ascii: atIva mudito rAjann idaM vacanam abravIt
text.ur: atīva mudito rājann idaṁ vacanam abravīt

text.ascii: dadyAM vittaM dvijAgryebhyaH zatrUNAM cApi durjayaH
text.ud: दद्यां वित्तं द्विजाग्र्येभ्यः शत्रूणां चापि दुर्जयः
text.ur: dadyāṁ vittaṁ dvijāgryebhyaḥ śatrūṇāṁ cāpi durjayaḥ

text.ascii: sakhyaM ca viSNunA me syAd bhUteSv adroha eva ca
text.ud: सख्यं च विष्णुना मे स्याद्भूतेष्वद्रोह एव च
text.ur: sakhyaṁ ca viṣṇunā me syād bhūteṣv adroha eva ca

text.ascii: dharme ratiz ca satataM svarge vAsas tathAkSayaH
text.ur: dharme ratiś ca satataṁ svarge vāsas tathākṣayaḥ

text.ascii: tathAstv iti tato devaiH prItair uktaH sa pArthivaH
text.ud: तथास्त्विति ततो देवैः प्रीतैरुक्तः स पार्थिवः
text.ur: tathāstv iti tato devaiḥ prītair uktaḥ sa pārthivaḥ

text.ascii: RSibhiz ca sagandharvair uttaGkena ca dhImatA
text.ur: r̥ṣibhiś ca sagandharvair uttaṅkena ca dhīmatā

text.ascii: sabhAjya cainaM vividhair AzIrvAdais tato nRpam
text.ur: sabhājya cainaṁ vividhair āśīrvādais tato nr̥pam

text.ascii: devA maharSayaz caiva svAni sthAnAni bhejire
text.ur: devā maharṣayaś caiva svāni sthānāni bhejire

text.ascii: tasya putrAs trayaH ziSTA yudhiSThira tadAbhavan
text.ur: tasya putrās trayaḥ śiṣṭā yudhiṣṭhira tadābhavan

text.ascii: dRDhAzvaH kapilAzvaz ca candrAzvaz caiva bhArata
text.ur: dr̥ḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaś ca candrāśvaś caiva bhārata

text.ascii: tebhyaH paramparA rAjann ikSvAkUNAM mahAtmanAm
text.ur: tebhyaḥ paramparā rājann ikṣvākūṇāṁ mahātmanām

text.ascii: evaM sa nihatas tena kuvalAzvena sattama
text.ur: evaṁ sa nihatas tena kuvalāśvena sattama

text.ascii: dhundhur daityo mahAvIryo madhukaiTabhayoH sutaH
text.ur: dhundhur daityo mahāvīryo madhukaiṭabhayoḥ sutaḥ

text.ascii: kuvalAzvas tu nRpatir dhundhumAra iti smRtaH
text.ur: kuvalāśvas tu nr̥patir dhundhumāra iti smr̥taḥ

text.ascii: nAmnA ca guNasaMyuktas tadA prabhRti so 'bhavat
text.ur: nāmnā ca guṇasaṁyuktas tadā prabhr̥ti so ’bhavat

text.ascii: etat te sarvam AkhyAtaM yan mAM tvaM paripRcchasi
text.ur: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṁ yan māṁ tvaṁ paripr̥cchasi

text.ascii: dhaundhumAram upAkhyAnaM prathitaM yasya karmaNA
text.ur: dhaundhumāram upākhyānaṁ prathitaṁ yasya karmaṇā

text.ascii: idaM tu puNyam AkhyAnaM viSNoH samanukIrtanam
text.ur: idaṁ tu puṇyam ākhyānaṁ viṣṇoḥ samanukīrtanam

text.ascii: zRNuyAd yaH sa dharmAtmA putravAMz ca bhaven naraH
text.ur: śr̥ṇuyād yaḥ sa dharmātmā putravāṁś ca bhaven naraḥ

text.ascii: AyuSmAn dhRtimAMz caiva zrutvA bhavati parvasu
text.ur: āyuṣmān dhr̥timāṁś caiva śrutvā bhavati parvasu

text.ascii: na ca vyAdhibhayaM kiM cit prApnoti vigatajvaraH
text.ur: na ca vyādhibhayaṁ kiṁ cit prāpnoti vigatajvaraḥ
